headline: The Dow Is Missing Out on the AMD Rally
summary: The blue-chip index, which weighs its members by stock price rather than market cap, fell sharply on a day when the Nasdaq and the S&P 500 were on track for record closing highs.  The Dow was down 266 points, or 0.6%.  Only 10 stocks in the index were rising, and some of its heaviest hitters—Sherwin-Williams, Home Depot, McDonald’s, and Salesforce—were big laggards.

headline: Sherwin-Williams Acquires BASF's Brazilian Paint Business Suvinil
summary: SHW expands its Latin American footprint with the acquisition of BASF's Brazilian paint brand Suvinil, boosting growth and scale in the region.

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock to Keep an Eye On and 2 We Question
summary: Large-cap stocks usually command their industries because they have the scale to drive market trends. The flip side though is that their sheer size can limit growth as expanding further becomes an increasingly challenging task.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock to Keep an Eye On and 2 We Question
